title: High-Torque Strain Wave Gear Actuator: Lynxmotion LSS-P-S1 for Advanced Robotics
description: The Lynxmotion’s Smart Servo PRO Standard Actuator (LSS-P-S1) is an innovative robotic actuator recently featured by RobotShop. This configurable servo motor is suited for both semi-professional and professional uses, including robot arms, animatronics, and research projects The company describes the Lynxmotion Smart Servos PRO series as a significant upgrade from the LSS hobby series and […]

title: NEXCOM’s 1U Rackmount Powered by Marvell OCTEON 10 Technology and up to 25GbE ports
description: NEXCOM has released the TCA 6710, a 1U rackmount appliance designed for edge and cloud computing, powered by the Marvell OCTEON 10 COM-HPC module. This latest offering marks an evolution from traditional COM-E technology, focusing on scalable computing solutions with enhanced server-class bandwidth, power, and performance. The heart of the TCA 6710 lies in its […]
